This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] Sending multiple messages simultaneously in unordered mode works reliably
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "InvalidStateError: Failed to execute 'send' on 'RTCDataChannel': RTCDataChannel.readyState is not 'open'"
[FAIL] Sending before the other side is open should work
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: negotiate is not defined"
Harness: the test ran to completion.
